code.content: Commercial Planning
Commercial Dept. Request
Aircraft Shortage
Reactionary Delay due to Tech
A/C not available due to WX
OA No gate-stand availability due to own airline activity
Inadequate planned time for flight
PM Missing Passenger, at gate [Moved from Dly 19]
SG Schedule Ground Time less than declared min ground time
PX OFF-LOADED PAX, with baggage, passenger request to disembark
PD LATE CHECK-IN, acceptance after deadline
PL LATE CHECK-IN, congestion in Check-in area
PE CHECK-IN ERROR, passenger and baggage
PO OVERSALES, booking errors
PH BOARDING, discrepancies and paging, missing, checked-in PAX
PS COMMERCIAL PUBLICITY / PASSENGER CONVIENCE, VIP, press, Ground meals and missing personal item
PC CATERING ORDER, late or incorrect
PB BAGGAGE PROCESSING, sorting etc.
REDUCED MOBILITY, Boarding/Deboarding of passengers with reduced mobility [NEW]
CD DOCUMENTATION, errors, etc.
CP LATE POSITIONING
CC LATE ACCEPTANCE
CI INADEQUATE PACKING
CO OVERSALES, booking errors
CU LATE PREPARATION in warehouse
CE DOCUMENTATION, PACKING, etc.
CL LATE POSITIONING
CA LATE ACCEPTANCE
GD AIRCRAFT DOCUMENTATION, Weight and Balance, Pax Manifest, Gen. Declaration, etc.
GL LOAD / UNLOADING, bulky, special load, cabin load, lack of loading staff
GE LOADING EQUIPMENT, lack of or breakdown, e.g. container pallet loader, lack of staff
GS SERVICING EQUIPMENT, lack of or breakdown, lack of staff, e.g. steps
GC AIRCRAFT CLEANING
GF FUELLING / DEFUELLING, fuel supplier
GB CATERING, late delivery or loading
GU ULD, lack of or serviceability
GT TECHNICAL EQUIPMENT, lack of or breakdown, lack of staff, e.g. pushback
A/C DEFECT CLEARED PRIOR TO ENGINEER ARRIVAL [Moved from Dly 8]
TD AIRCRAFT DEFECTS
TM SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE, late release
TN NON-SCHEDULED MAINTENANCE EQUIPMENT special check and / or additional works beyond normal maintenance schedule
TS SPARES and MAINTENANCE EQUIPMENT, lack of or breakdown
TA AOG SPARES, to be carried to another station
TC AIRCRAFT CHANGE, for Technical reason
TL STANDBY AIRCRAFT, lack of planned standby aircraft for Technical reason
TV SCHEDULED CABIN CONFIGURATION VERSION ADJUSTMENTS
DF DAMAGE DURING FLIGHT OPERATION, bird or lighting strike, Turbulence, Heavy or overweighting landing, collision during taxiing
DAMAGE DURING GROUND OPERATION, collision (other than during taxiing), loading / off-loading damage, contamination, towing, extreme weather conditions
ED DEPARTURE CONTROL
EC CARGO PREPARATION/DOCUMENTATION
EF FLIGHT PLANS
EO OTHER AUTOMATED SYSTEM format [NEW]
FP FLIGHT PLAN, late completion or change of, flight documentation
FF OPERATIONAL REQUIREMENTS, fuel, load alteration
FT LATE CREW BOARDING or DEP PROCEDURES, other than connection and standby (Flight Deck or entire crew)
FS FLIGHT DECK CREW SHORTAGE, sickness, awaiting standby, Flt time limitations, crew meals, valid visa, health documents, etc.
FR FLIGHT DECK CREW SPECIAL REQUEST, not within operational requirements
FL LATE CABIN CREW BOARDING or PROCEDURES, other than connection and standby
FC CABIN CREW SHORTAGE, sickness, awaiting standby, Flt time limitations, crew meals, valid visa, health documents, etc.
FA CABIN CREW ERROR or SPECIAL REQUEST, not within operational requirements
FB CAPTAIN REQUEST for SECURITY CHECK extraordinary
WO DEPARTURE STATION
WT DESTINATION STATION
WR EN ROUTE or ALTERNATE
WI DE-ICING of AIRCRAFT, remain of ice and / or snow, frost prevention excluding unserviceability of equipment.
WS REMOVAL of SNOW, ICE, WATER and SAND from airport
WG GROUND HANDLING IMPAIRED BY ADVERSE WX CONDITION
AT ATFM due to ATC EN-ROUTE DEMAND / CAPACITY, standard demand / capacity problems
AX ATFM due to ATC STAFF / EQIPMENT EN-ROUTE

AE ATFM due to RESTRICTION AT DESTINATION AIRPORT airport and / or runway closed due to obstruction, industrial action, staff shortage, political unrest, noise abatement, night curfew, special flights
AW ATFM due to WEATHER AT DESTINATION
AS MANDATORY SECURITY
AG IMMIGRATION, CUSTOMS, HEALTH
AF AIRPORT FACILITIES, parking stands, ramp congestion, lighting, buildings, gate limitations, etc.
AD RESTRICTIONS AT AIRPORT OF DESTINATION, airport and / or runway closed due to obstruction, industrial action, staff shortage, political unrest, noise abatement, night curfew, special flights

AM RESTRICTIONS AT AIRPORT OF DEPARTURE WITH or WITHOUT ATFN RESTRICTIONS, including Air Traffic Service, start-up and pushback, airport and / or runway closed due to obstruction or weather (Restriction due to weather in case of AFTM regulation only, else refer to code 71(W0)), industrial action, staff shortage, political unrest, noise abatement, night curfew, special flights
RL LOAD CONNECTION, awaiting load from another flight
RT THROUGH CHECK-IN ERROR, passenger and baggage
RA AIRCRAFT ROTATION, late arrival of aircraft from another flight or previous sector
RS CABIN CREW ROTATION, awaiting cabin crew from another flight
RC CREW ROTATION, awaiting crew from another flight (flight deck or entire crew)
RO OPERATIONS CONTROL, rerouting,diversion, consolidation, aircraft change for reasons other than technical
MI INDUSTRIAL ACTION WITH OWN AIRLINE
MO INDUSTRIAL ACTION OUTSIDE OWN AIRLINE, excluding ATS
MX This code shall be used only when it is dear that a reason cannot be matched to a code above (explain in SI section)
